xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set($import = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("GoogleSites.Groovy")) #set($ok = $import.init($xwiki, $xcontext, $doc)) #if($request.reset) #set($ok = $import.endImport()) #end #if($importStatus.active) Import is active
[[Stop the import>>||queryString="reset=1"]] #else Import is not active #end {{/velocity}}
